content: The **list of hotels in Singapore** provides hotel names by location within Singapore. ## By location ### [Central](/wiki/Central_Region,_Singapore) - [Goodwood Park Hotel](/wiki/Goodwood_Park_Hotel) - [Rendezvous Hotel Singapore](/wiki/Rendezvous_Hotel_Singapore) ### [Chinatown](/wiki/Chinatown,_Singapore) - [Damenlou Hotel](/wiki/Damenlou_Hotel) - [New Majestic Hotel](/wiki/New_Majestic_Hotel) - [The Scarlet Singapore](/wiki/The_Scarlet_Singapore) ### Downtown - [Fairmont Singapore](/wiki/Fairmont_Singapore) - [Oasia Hotel Downtown](/wiki/Oasia_Hotel_Downtown) - [Parkroyal Collection Pickering](/wiki/Parkroyal_Collection_Pickering,_Singapore) - [Raffles Hotel](/wiki/Raffles_Hotel) - [The New 7th Storey Hotel](/wiki/The_New_7th_Storey_Hotel) - [South Beach Tower](/wiki/South_Beach_Tower) - [Swissôtel The Stamford](/wiki/Swiss%C3%B4tel_The_Stamford) ### Marina Centre - Conrad Singapore Marina Bay - [The Fullerton Hotel Singapore](/wiki/The_Fullerton_Hotel_Singapore) - [Mandarin Oriental](/wiki/Mandarin_Oriental,_Singapore) - [Marina Bay Sands](/wiki/Marina_Bay_Sands) - [The Pan Pacific Singapore](/wiki/The_Pan_Pacific_Singapore) - [Parkroyal Collection Marina Bay](/wiki/Parkroyal_Collection_Marina_Bay,_Singapore) - [The Ritz-Carlton Millenia Singapore](/wiki/The_Ritz-Carlton_Millenia_Singapore) ### [Orchard Road](/wiki/Orchard_Road) - [Hilton Singapore Orchard](/wiki/Hilton_Singapore_Orchard) - [Holiday Inn Park View Singapore](/wiki/Holiday_Inn) - [Shangri-La Hotel Singapore](/wiki/Shangri-La_Hotel_Singapore) - [St Regis Singapore](/wiki/St._Regis_Hotels_%26_Resorts) ### [Sentosa](/wiki/Sentosa) - [Capella Singapore](/wiki/Capella_Resort,_Singapore) - Crockfords Tower, formerly planned to be named Maxims Tower, is an 11-storey all-suite hotel overlooking the [Singapore harbour](/wiki/Port_of_Singapore) and the [Southern Islands](/wiki/Southern_Islands). The resort's casino is located beneath the tower. The hotel was topped-out on 27 February 2009 and opened on 20 January 2010. Both the latter and Hotel Michael (11-storey hotel named after Michael Graves, topped out on 15 July 2009 and was opened on 20 January 2010), sits on the area of the former [Sentosa Musical Fountain](/wiki/Sentosa_Musical_Fountain). The hotel also features Crockfords Premier, a casino club with private rooms for high rollers located on the 10th floor. ## Former hotels - [Sloane Court Hotel](/wiki/Sloane_Court_Hotel) ## Gallery - [Lists of hotels](/wiki/Lists_of_hotels) – an index of hotel list articles on Wikipedia Portals: - Singapore - Companies - Lists
